She didn't deduce anything. She distrusted Jezby because she is a distrusful person. Just because a show is trash doesn't mean we can't watch it. Some people hold on to it in hopes that it gets better, because it's still a form of entertainment. or because they love the genre... For me personally, I just love watching bad shows in general... Plus, it kinda helps me appreciate and respect the better ones even more. Although, I do agree that complaining about it all the time is unnecessary. But it's still their opinion at the of the day. So, calling them dumb won't solve anything. If you don't agree, why don't you tell them why they're wrong and why the show is good or great instead? That'll be smarter and might even make them look even dumber if you're right.
